data.title: Cercospora nicotianae (frog-eye leaf spot of tobacco)
data.meta_description:
This datasheet on Cercospora nicotianae covers Identity, Overview, Distribution, Dispersal,
Hosts/Species Affected, Diagnosis, Biology & Ecology, Impacts, Prevention/Control,
Further Information.
data.text:
Abstract

This datasheet on Cercospora nicotianae covers Identity, Overview, Distribution, Dispersal, Hosts/Species Affected, Diagnosis, Biology & Ecology, Impacts, Prevention/Control, Further Information.
